name: Club Penguin Island
description:
There's an amazing community of penguins ready to meet you. Join the club and discover the secrets, myths, legends, treasures, and endless possibilities! Waddle with friends, quest for special rewards, level up and throw the ultimate igloo parties. There are things for EVERYONE to do every day!

What can EVERY PENGUIN do?
(Okay, take a deep breath here)… Run, jump, swim, and dive into five world zones of beaches, mountains, underwater caves, and more! Make friends and invite them to your custom made igloo, strut your stuff in team dance battles, journey on adventures with Aunt Arctic, Rookie and Rockhopper, earn emojis, discover all kinds of collectibles, level up, find hidden treasure chests, complete challenges each day, kick beach balls, bounce on trampolines, team up for snowball games, launch yourself into the air on water geysers, fire yourself from cannons... and more! Plus there’s always new stuff to look forward to!

What else should you know about your new island home?

SOCIAL PARADISE
We’re friendly here! The island is full of penguins to meet and places to discover.

FASHION-FORWARD
Did we mention our crazy sense of style? Everything you’ll create is unique (and amazing)!

QUESTS & SURPRISES
Discover special rewards, valuable coins, and unexpected surprises as you and your friends explore.

ENTERTAINMENT CENTRAL
See a concert, or BE the concert! You have your very own igloo to host the ultimate party!
